title: Unable to get the beacon information in my Android app?
body:
I am new to Beacon and trying to develop proximity Android app using iBeacon. I have purchased iBeacon from one of the manufacturer in China so I am trying to develop the proximity app where if I found the beacon in the range it show send some notification to the customer. I have tried Android Beacon Library but it is not giving any result .

If anybody could help me how can I use it if I am doing something wrong. I have used MonitoringActivity sample code to test .. but nothing worked .

Please help me .
